DOC.brief_summary: This project aim : 1 ) evaluate long-term effectiveness telemedicine detect diabetic retinopathy compare traditional surveillance method , 2 ) identify health belief factor related adherence annual diabetic eye exam , 3 ) determine cost-effectiveness telemedicine system perspective community clinic , third-party payer , individual patient .
DOC.brief_title: The Comparative Effectiveness Telemedicine Detect Diabetic Retinopathy
DOC.criteria: diabetic , least 18 year old , patient participate health clinic
